game.title: The Mysterious Temple Adventure
game.objective: Uncover the treasure hidden in the ancient temple
game.description: In a dense jungle, there lies an enigmatic temple believed to harbor a priceless artifact. Many expeditions have attempted the quest, but few succeeded. Are you ready to unravel its secrets?

task.objective: Discover the entrance to the temple by the hidden grove
task.description: The map suggests a secret entrance behind a canopy of unusual plants. Search for the grove and look out for any clues or markers.

task.objective: Obtain the temple key from the wise elder
task.description: The elder holds the key,换取 knowledge about the tribe's history. Show respect and learn their protocol to acquire it.
The temple's defenses are intricate – be cautious of pressure plates and转动 stones. Solve each puzzle to progress safely.

task.objective: Find the treasure chamber in the depths of the temple
task.description: The final challenge awaits, hidden behind a hidden room. Your wit and determination will determine if you can uncover the treasure.
